messages.content:
You are a world state generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to transform an abstract scenario into a concrete, detailed world_state JSON.

The world_state should include:
1. All metadata from the scenario (scenario_id, description, noise_level, depth, global_settings, people, projects)
2. sub_scenarios_expanded: For each abstract sub_scenario from the input scenario, create a concrete expanded version with:
   - Concrete ISO datetime timestamps
   - Specific participant IDs/emails
   - Detailed event descriptions
   - Any seeds needed for data generation
   - This array should contain ONLY the expanded versions of the sub_scenarios listed in the input scenario
3. noise_scenarios: An array of noise-only scenario objects that are NOT part of the core sub_scenarios:
   - These should be realistic but unrelated workplace events/messages/activities
   - Each noise scenario should have similar structure to sub_scenarios_expanded (id, type, timestamps, participants, etc.)
   - The number of noise scenarios should scale with the noise_level parameter

IMPORTANT: Do NOT include per_source_plans in the world_state. The world_state is scenario-centric only.

IMPORTANT PARAMETERS:
- noise_level (0-1): Controls amount of unrelated/off-task data
  * 0 = almost no noise, only data directly relevant to sub_scenarios (noise_scenarios should be empty or minimal)
  * 1 = lots of unrelated messages/events/files (still realistic) (noise_scenarios should contain many entries)
- depth (0-1): Controls how indirect the evidence is
  * 0 = sub_scenario realized directly (e.g., one clear Slack message)
  * 1 = sub_scenario requires multi-step, multi-source chaining to infer
  * Intermediate values interpolate behavior

CRITICAL: sub_scenarios_expanded must correspond exactly to the sub_scenarios in the input scenario. All other unrelated scenarios should go in noise_scenarios.

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the world_state schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "scenario_id": "scenario_group5_v3",
  "description": "Mixed planning meeting scenario with moderate noise and depth (variant 3)",
  "noise_level": 0.5,

  ],

        },
        {
          "name": "Development",
          "date": "2025-11-20"
        },
        {

          "date": "2025-11-30"
        }
      ],

        {
          "issue_key": "DAT-100",
          "summary": "Data Migration - Initial Setup",
          "status": "Done"
        },
        {
          "issue_key": "DAT-101",
          "summary": "Data Migration - Core Feature",
          "status": "In Progress"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "sub_scenarios_expanded": [
    {
      "id": "planning_meeting_v3",
      "type": "planning_meeting",
      "abstract_description": "Alex wants to have a sync meeting this Friday with Jordan, Sam, Taylor about the Data Migration.",
      "participants_hint": [
        "Alex",
        "Jordan",
        "Sam",
        "Taylor"
      ],
      "constraints_hint": {
        "approx_duration_minutes": 60,
        "time_window": "this_friday"
      },
      "expanded": {
        "timezone": "Asia/Seoul",
        "target_meeting_date": "2025-11-28",
        "events": [
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_slack_initial",
            "type": "slack_message",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T10:12:00+09:00",
            "channel": "proj-dat-migration",
            "from": "person_alex_smith",
            "to": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown"
            ],
            "text": "Hey @Jordan @Sam @Taylor, we should do a sync this Friday to align on the Data Migration (DAT) work before we get too close to the 11/30 launch. Looking for a 60-min block sometime in the afternoon. I'll follow up with a calendar hold once I check a couple of conflicts.",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_proposal",
            "type": "email",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T11:03:00+09:00",
            "from": "person_alex_smith",
            "to": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown"
            ],
            "cc": [
              "person_morgan_garcia"
            ],
            "subject": "[DAT] Friday data migration sync - time options",
            "body": "Hi all,\n\nAs mentioned in Slack, I'd like to get a 60-min sync this Friday (Nov 28) to go through the Data Migration plan before the 11/30 launch.\n\nProposed options (Asia/Seoul):\n- 14:00–15:00\n- 15:00–16:00\n\nCould you reply-all with which slots work for you? Once we converge, I'll send a calendar invite.\n\nTentative agenda:\n1) Review current status of DAT-100 / DAT-101\n2) Identify remaining migration tasks\n3) Risks around the Nov 30 launch window\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_reply_jordan",
            "type": "email",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T11:24:00+09:00",
            "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
            "to": [
              "person_alex_smith"
            ],
            "cc": [
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown",
              "person_morgan_garcia"
            ],
            "subject": "Re: [DAT] Friday data migration sync - time options",
            "body": "Both 14:00–15:00 and 15:00–16:00 work for me this Friday.\n\nIf possible I slightly prefer 14:00–15:00 so I can get back to the ingestion scripts afterwards.\n\nJordan",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_reply_sam",
            "type": "email",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T11:41:00+09:00",
            "from": "person_sam_williams",
            "to": [
              "person_alex_smith"
            ],
            "cc": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_taylor_brown",
              "person_morgan_garcia"
            ],
            "subject": "Re: [DAT] Friday data migration sync - time options",
            "body": "14:00–15:00 works better for me on Friday. I have a design review at 15:00 that I can't move.\n\nSam",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_slack_taylor_conflict",
            "type": "slack_message",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T12:05:00+09:00",
            "channel": "proj-dat-migration",
            "from": "person_taylor_brown",
            "to": [
              "person_alex_smith"
            ],
            "mentions": [
              "person_alex_smith",
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams"
            ],
            "text": "@Alex I just replied via email but TL;DR: I can't do 14:00–15:00 on Friday (1:1 with Morgan). 15:00–16:00 works, or I can do 16:00–17:00 if we absolutely need more time.",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_email_reply_taylor",
            "type": "email",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-26T12:07:00+09:00",
            "from": "person_taylor_brown",
            "to": [
              "person_alex_smith"
            ],
            "cc": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_morgan_garcia"
            ],
            "subject": "Re: [DAT] Friday data migration sync - time options",
            "body": "15:00–16:00 works for me.\n\nI'm blocked 14:00–15:00 with Morgan, but could also do 16:00–17:00 in a pinch.\n\nTaylor",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_calendar_hold",
            "type": "calendar_event",
            "created_timestamp": "2025-11-26T13:15:00+09:00",
            "updated_timestamp": "2025-11-27T09:01:00+09:00",
            "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
            "participants": [
              "person_alex_smith",
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown"
            ],
            "subject": "[DAT] Data Migration planning sync",
            "body": "Goal: Align on Data Migration (DAT) plan before 11/30 launch.\n\nAgenda:\n- Status review: DAT-100 (setup), DAT-101 (core feature)\n- Remaining migration tasks and owners\n- Rollback / risk mitigation for Nov 30 launch\n\nPlease update this invite if your availability changes.",
            "location": "Zoom",
            "start": "2025-11-28T15:00:00+09:00",
            "end": "2025-11-28T16:00:00+09:00",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_slack_confirmation",
            "type": "slack_message",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-27T09:05:00+09:00",
            "channel": "proj-dat-migration",
            "from": "person_alex_smith",
            "to": [
              "person_jordan_johnson",
              "person_sam_williams",
              "person_taylor_brown"
            ],
            "text": "Thanks all — calendar invite sent for Friday 15:00–16:00 (Asia/Seoul) for the DAT migration planning sync. If anything critical comes up before then, drop it in this channel.",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          },
          {
            "event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_calendar_reschedule_note",
            "type": "calendar_event_note",
            "timestamp": "2025-11-27T09:01:00+09:00",
            "calendar_event_id": "planning_meeting_v3_calendar_hold",
            "author": "person_alex_smith",
            "note": "Confirmed 15:00–16:00 slot after Taylor flagged conflict with 14:00–15:00. No change to duration or participants.",
            "related_project": "DAT"
          }
        ],
        "data_generation_seeds": {
          "base_date": "2025-11-26",
          "meeting_duration_minutes": 60,
          "preferred_window": "afternoon",
          "random_seed": 7031
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "noise_scenarios": [
    {
      "id": "noise_hr_policy_update",

          "from": "hr@company.com",
          "to": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams",

          ],
          "subject": "[HR] Year-end holiday policy and office closure dates",
          "body": "Dear all,\n\nPlease note the year-end office closure dates and updated holiday policy attached.\n\nKey points:\n- Office closed Dec 30–Jan 1\n- Mandatory use of at least 5 days of PTO before Jan 31\n\nRegards,\nHR Team"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "noise_eng_deploy_incident",
      "type": "incident",
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "noise_incident_slack_1",
          "type": "slack_message",

          "from": "person_morgan_garcia",
          "to": [
            "person_taylor_brown"
          ],
          "text": "@Taylor can you help check why the 2.17.3 deployment is stuck in staging? Logs show a timeout on the health check."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "noise_incident_slack_2",
          "type": "slack_message",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-27T14:27:00+09:00",
          "channel": "eng-deploys",
          "from": "person_taylor_brown",
          "to": [
            "person_morgan_garcia"
          ],
          "text": "Looks like the new TLS settings require an updated cert in staging. Rolling back to 2.17.2 while I fix the config."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "noise_incident_jira_comment",
          "type": "jira_comment",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-27T14:55:00+09:00",
          "issue_key": "OPS-342",
          "author": "person_taylor_brown",
          "comment": "Root cause: incorrect TLS configuration in staging. Rolled back deployment and updated helm chart with correct secrets. Re-deployment succeeded."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "noise_design_review_meeting",
      "type": "calendar_meeting",
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "noise_design_review_calendar",
          "type": "calendar_event",

          "updated_timestamp": "2025-11-26T09:02:00+09:00",
          "organizer": "person_casey_jones",
          "participants": [
            "person_casey_jones",
            "person_sam_williams",
            "person_alex_smith"
          ],
          "subject": "UX review - onboarding flow revamp",
          "body": "Weekly UX review of the onboarding flow redesign. Focus this week: mobile breakpoints and error states.",
          "location": "Meeting Room B",
          "start": "2025-11-28T15:00:00+09:00",
          "end": "2025-11-28T15:30:00+09:00"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "noise_design_review_reschedule_note",
          "type": "calendar_event_note",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-26T09:02:00+09:00",
          "calendar_event_id": "noise_design_review_calendar",
          "author": "person_casey_jones",
          "note": "Rescheduled to next week to avoid conflict with Engineering planning and data work.",
          "new_start": "2025-12-05T15:00:00+09:00",
          "new_end": "2025-12-05T15:30:00+09:00"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "noise_rnd_weekly_sync",
      "type": "team_meeting",
      "events": [

          "event_id": "noise_rnd_sync_calendar",
          "type": "calendar_event",

          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_sam_williams",
            "person_casey_jones"
          ],
          "subject": "R&D Weekly Standup",
          "body": "Standing weekly R&D sync. 15-min quick updates.",
          "location": "Huddle Room / Zoom",
          "recurrence": "WEEKLY",
          "start": "2025-11-27T09:15:00+09:00",
          "end": "2025-11-27T09:30:00+09:00"
        },
        {
          "event_id": "noise_rnd_sync_slack",
          "type": "slack_message",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-27T09:11:00+09:00",
          "channel": "rnd-team",

          "to": [
            "person_sam_williams",
            "person_casey_jones"
          ],
          "text": "Running 5 min late for R&D standup, just wrapping another call. Please start without me and I'll jump in."
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "noise_jira_misc_work",
      "type": "jira_activity",
      "events": [
        {
          "event_id": "noise_jira_comment_dat101",
          "type": "jira_comment",

          "issue_key": "DAT-101",
          "author": "person_jordan_johnson",
          "comment": "Implemented initial migration script for user profile data. Pending review from Sam on performance impact."
        },
        {
          "event_id": "noise_jira_transition_dat100",
          "type": "jira_transition",
          "timestamp": "2025-11-25T17:05:00+09:00",
          "issue_key": "DAT-100",
          "author": "person_morgan_garcia",
          "from_status": "In Progress",
          "to_status": "Done",
          "comment": "Verified environment setup and connectivity. Marking as Done."
        }
      ]
    }
